entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Forillon (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 70 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
